abstractive.text: The project manager opens this conceptual design meeting and gives them the agenda.

extractive.speaker: A

extractive.speaker: A

abstractive.text: The industrial designer presents first and talks about the components of a remote, energy source options, and materials for the remote, case, and buttons.
